title: Richardson Bay Regional Agency and BERSCHLER Communications

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All communications between Jenna Brady, Brian Washington, or any attorneys hired by the County of Marin, sent to Arnold Berschler or any other agent of BERSCHLER ASSOCIATES, PC ; between January 1st 2019 to November 22nd, 2024.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson

title: Task Order Agreement (TOA) # R00B7400027 / R00B0600080 COK25850 - Child Care Systems Maintenance and Enhancements – Extension and Modification Justification

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Maryland Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents relating to Task Order Agreement (TOA) # R00B7400027 / R00B0600080 COK25850 - Child Care Systems Maintenance and Enhancements – Extension and Modification Justification, awarded to The Canton Group. This includes scope of work, scope of services, contract documents, RFP's, and sole source announcements.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Toni Thompson
